original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘gadrabhassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena gadrabhassa ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, gadrabho nāma saṅkārakūṭepi catukkepi siṅghāṭakepi gāmadvārepi thusarāsimhipi yattha katthaci sayati, na sayanabahulo hoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja gadrabhaḥ nāma saṅkāra kūṭe pi catukke pi siṅghāṭake pi gāma dvāre pi thusarāsimhi pi yattha katthaci sayati na sayana bahulaḥ hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena tiṇasanthārepi paṇṇasanthārepi kaṭṭhamañcakepi
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena tiṇa santhāre pi paṇṇa santhāre pi kaṭṭha mañcake pi

original: chamāyapi yattha katthaci cammakhaṇḍaṁ pattharitvā yattha katthaci sayitabbaṁ, na
analyzed: yattha katthaci camma khaṇḍam pattharitvā yattha katthaci na

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gadrabhassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘kaliṅgarūpadhānā, bhikkhave, etarahi mama sāvakā viharanti appamattā ātāpino padhānasmin’ti.
analyzed: bhāsitam peta mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena kaliṅga rūpadhānāḥ bhikkhave etarahi mama sāvakāḥ viharanti appamattāḥ ātāpinaḥ padhānasmin ti
mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā api
